Room.Name: Archive Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an ancient archive room where historical relics are kept.
Room.LongDescription: The magnificent room glows with a powerful golden aura which almost blinds you as you enter. There is but one object in the room, which is the source of the powerful, golden glow (assuming someone hasn't already looted the archive room). You can see some script carved into the wall which reads "The power of the scroll can only be unleashed by a wizard of great power."
